You and Rah enjoy exploring the woods together. The forest outside of Chegckle is a completely different world. The forest floor doesn't see a lot of sun due to the trees, so on hot days the forest is a nice place to escape to.

One day Rah knocks on your door bursting with excitement.

"I found the coolest thing in the woods!" they say with excitement.
